channel.title: Server IP and Port in client removal[Delta]
channel.description:
I tried to remove the "IP" and "Port" part in a Delta client.
This is how it looked before [IMG]http://i625.photobucket.com/albums/tt332/zs4yswtf/IMG1-1.jpg[/img]
So i removed this code [code] aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Port: " + port + ((anInt1216 == 3) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;[/code]
And it looked like this [IMG]http://i625.photobucket.com/albums/tt332/zs4yswtf/IMG2.jpg[/img]
But if you hit enter twice you cant still change the IP, plus that un-needed space is still there.
How do i fix this?

item.title: Server IP and Port in client removal[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I tried to remove the “IP” and “Port” part in a Delta client.

This is how it looked before

So i removed this code

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Port: " + port + ((anInt1216 == 3) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;

And it looked like this

But if you hit enter twice you cant still change the IP, plus that un-needed space is still there.

How do i fix this?

Read full topic
item.source: Server IP and Port in client removal[Delta]
